title: Sustainable Footwear & Prosumers
description: Generation gatekeepers should enable consumers' contribution in the creative process to achieve a holistic footwear business.
solution: By elevating consumers (w/ NFTs) into prosumers that are engaged and rewarded, building a thriving circular economy on Cardano.
experience:
20+yrs FW experience between Nike + other luxury activewear brands, also AR/VR, UI, UX & 3D.  

\+ Awareness of current system in approach.
